Challengers, enter here
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Mayors Cup: Metropolis Champions (MR4): Challengers, enter here
By Petit-Trot on Thursday, June 24, 2004 - 03:51 pm:

So you want to challenge a Champion. Here's what you need to know.

The tournaments are no longer being held, ignore these instrucions.

Pre-requisits
-Read Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Tournaments): Guidelines For Tournament Participants & Spectators.
-Read Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Tournaments): Guidelines For Tournament Hosts.
-You need a Sharkport, a X-port or a Max Drive to enter your monster.
-Your monster must be on ranch, not frozen or in VS-data, on the save you are sending.

How to proceed
-Add the stats of your monster.
-Request a slot number at metropolis.champions@gmail.com. That request must contain the name of the monster and its stat total composite. (It wouldn't hurt if you posted on the board or came in chat to tell me to go take look in the inbox.)
-When your request has been answered, you can send in the monster on the slot that has been assigned to it. The file must be named like this: Monstername_type_4995_TrainerHandle.sps or xps.
